mapper.select: SELECT faq_no, faq_title, faq_content, faq_cnt, m_id, faq_date FROM faq ORDER BY faq_no DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE faq SET faq_cnt = faq_cnt + 1 WHERE faq_no = #{faq_no}
mapper.insert: insert into faq (faq_no, faq_title, faq_content, faq_cnt, m_id, faq_date) values ( (select nvl(max(faq_no),0)+1 from faq), #{faq_title }, #{faq_content }, #{faq_cnt }, 'admin', systimestamp)
mapper.update: update faq set faq_no=#{faq_no}, faq_title=#{faq_title }, faq_content=#{faq_content }, faq_cnt=#{faq_cnt}, m_id=#{m_id}, faq_date=systimestamp where faq_no=#{faq_no}
